flows.title: Abandoned Checkout
flows.description:
Email 1: Don't let your perfect pair slip away! Dynamic block with abandoned pickleball shoes. Your feet deserve the performance boost - complete your order now. Offer: 10% off with code COURTREADY10

Email 2: Still thinking about those shoes? Dynamic block with abandoned product. Benefits of Montis pickleball footwear - heel reinforcement, toe protection, court stability. Your game is waiting. Use code COURTREADY10 for 10% off.

Email 3: Customer testimonial email "These shoes changed my game" - reviews and photos of players who chose Montis for better court performance. Dynamic section with abandoned shoes "Your perfect fit is still available" + 10% off reminder.

Email 4: Last chance for 10% off! Dynamic block with abandoned product. If these aren't the right fit, explore our other colorways and styles. Show alternative options from the complete collection before discount expires.
flows.notes:
Email 1: Don't let your perfect pair slip away! Dynamic block with abandoned pickleball shoes. Your feet deserve the performance boost - complete your order now. Offer: 10% off with code COURTREADY10

Email 2: Still thinking about those shoes? Dynamic block with abandoned product. Benefits of Montis pickleball footwear - heel reinforcement, toe protection, court stability. Your game is waiting. Use code COURTREADY10 for 10% off.

Email 3: Customer testimonial email "These shoes changed my game" - reviews and photos of players who chose Montis for better court performance. Dynamic section with abandoned shoes "Your perfect fit is still available" + 10% off reminder.

Email 4: Last chance for 10% off! Dynamic block with abandoned product. If these aren't the right fit, explore our other colorways and styles. Show alternative options from the complete collection before discount expires.

flows.title: Browse Flow
flows.description:
4 email flow:

email #1: We saw you browsing. Look again. Dynamic block. Collections blow (all access pass, bundles, plugins)

Email #2: Still Looking? Check it out again now. Dynamic block.. Want everything for free for 1 month? Check out all access pass / benefits

Email 3: 10% off your items. Lock in your items at this price. A bit of info about safari pedals. Need help? Contact support

Email 4: 15% off is expiring. Take a look at our collections (collections block: all access pass, bundles, plugnis)

flows.title: Lead Form Rework
flows.description: For custom golf carts, people request a quote. Then a transactional emails sends to them, then this flow starts. So generic messaging like did you see your quote? Finish checking out, your golf cart is waiting, etc. Email 1 should feature a callout to schedule time with paul. Include a dynamic block on each email - we can dynamically display the cart they csutomised and got a quote one.
